TextView.android:text: A meeting with a health care professional.
A visit to the doctor when you are not sick, also called a well visit
When you pay a set fee every time you go to the doctor and your insurance pays the rest.
An unexpected situation which poses an immediate health risk.
A program where you pay each copay and then the program pays for your healthcare
MED uh cal in TERP ret er
A person who is trained to translate for doctors and patients.
A place for you to go for basic health care needs.
A category of walk-in clinic. Primarily treat injuries or illnesses requiring immediate care, but not serious enough for an ER visit.
A health care center staffed by a group of health practitioners and nurses provides typical health services.
Reaction to foods, medications, products, etc may cause allergic reations.
A division of a local or larger government responsible for the oversight and care of matters relating to public health.
When your body temperature is too high.
The health problems you had in the past.
Used when you are sick or have aches and pain to help make you feel well.
When your throat hurts, it is hard to swallow.
Something that happens in the body that shows you have an injury or illness.
Gen AIR ik MED uh sin
Not a name brand medicine, usually less expensive than the name brand.
On the bottle or box to describe the medicine and how to take it.
Medicine anyone can buy at a store, you do not need a prescription.
Where you go to buy medicine.
A person who works in the pharmacy and fills prescriptions.
You need one of these to buy some kinds of medication.
Measurement of how much liquid medicine is needed. (tsp)
Provides immunity against one or several diseases.
Becoming immune to disease, typically by getting a vaccine.
An effect you get from taking some medicines.
Foods that help you feel full and helps stool come out.
In foods and needed by people to stay healthy.
List of what goes into a meal and how to prepare it.
Another word for salt. Should be eaten in limited amounts.
A kind of nutrient in foods that help fight sickness and keep the body strong and healthy.
